name: Cute attack
description:
Cute Attacks is a Shoot’em up, a subgenre of electronic shooting games where the character engages in a solitary attack, shooting at various enemies and avoiding their attacks.

Cute Attacks is an adventure about a cowboy called Theodoro, the last serious human being in the world. All the humans have been seduced by the unicorns that vomit rainbows and kawaii items. Now, Theodoro must fight back this evil of humanity.
